Item.name: Mbyll të gjitha VEÇ dokumentit aktual
Mbyll të gjitha në të majtë
Mbyll të gjitha në të djathtë
Rikthe filin e mbyllur së fundmi
Nyjëto komentin e linjës së vetme
Largo zbrazëtirat e panevojshme dhe EOL
Rruga e filit aktual për Clipboard
Emri i filit aktual për Clipboard
Largo linjat e zbrazëta (përmban karaktere të zbrazëta)
Fut linjë të zbrazët sipër aktuales
Fut linjë të zbrazët poshtë aktuales
Zgjedh të gjitha ndërmjet përkimeve të gjetura
Shfaq hapësirën e bardhë dhe TAB
Nyjëto në mënyrën Ekran i plotë
Kodo në UCS-2 Endian e madhe
Kodo në UCS-2 Endiane e vogël
Konverto në UCS-2 Endiane e madhe
Konverto në UCS-2 Endiane e vogël
Hap të gjithë filet e fundit
Zbraz listën e fileve të fundit
Rruga e filit të plotë në Clipboard
Mbylli të gjitha në të majtë
Mbylli të gjitha në të djathtë
Hap dosjen e përmbajtjes në Explorer
Hap dosjen e përmbajtjes në cmd
Zëvendëso të gjitha në dokumentet e hapura
Gjej të gjitha në dokumentet e hapura
Gjej të gjitha në dokumentin aktual
Nuk mund të shkoni më tej se:
Treat each line as a separate string
Fjalë kyëe të përcaktuara nga përdoruesi
Aftëso ngjyrën globale të planit të parë
Aftëso stilin global të shkrimit me të zeza
Aftëso stilin global të shkrimit kursiv
Aftëso stilin global të shkrimit të nënvizuar

ConflictInfoOk.name: No shortcut conflicts for this item.

Item.name: This will remove shortcut from this command
Palos kompakt (palos linjat e zbrazëta gjithashtu)
Palosja në stilin e kodit 2 (kërkohen ndarës):
Lejo një hapësirë të bardhë paraprakisht
Vizato një linjë me ngjyra në tabelorin aktiv
Shfaq butonin mbyll në secilin tab
Kliko dyfish për të mbyllur dokumentin
Fsheh (përdor Alt ose tastin F10 për ta nyjezuar)
Pasivizo tiparin e avancuar të rrëshqitjes (nëse keni problem me fushën e prekjes)
Apliko për filet e hapura ANSI
Kujto drejtorinë e përdorur së fundi
Use new style dialog (without file extension feature && Unix style path capacity)
Open all files of folder instead of launching Folder as Workspace on folder dropping
Shfaq këtu rregullimet e variablit tuaj
Mos e kontrollo në kohën e drekës
Rruga e filit me emër të plotë
Aftëso sesionin fotografi dhe backup periodik
Kujto sesionin aktual për drekën tjetër
Parametrat e funksionit aluzion për hyrjet
Hap seionin e një instance të re Notepad++
* Modifikimi i këtij rregullimi ka nevojë për rifillimin e Notepad++
Rregullimet e zgjedhjes delimiter (Ctrl + Miu klikim dyfish)
Use default Word character list as it is
Add your character as part of word (don't choose it unless you know what you're doing)
Rrëshqit deri në linjën e fundit pas aktualizimit
Shfaq vetëm emrin e filit në linjën e titullit
Trajto karakterin backslash si escape për SQL
Ekzekuto deri në fund të filit

ContextMenuXmlEditWarning.title: Korrigjimi i menysë së përmbajtjes
ContextMenuXmlEditWarning.message: Korrigjimi i contextMenu.xml ju lejon të modifikoni menytë taf-paf (popup) të përmbajtjes së Notepad++.\rDuhet të rifilloni Notepad++, që të hyjë në efekt pas modifikimit të contextMenu.xml.

NppHelpAbsentWarning.title: Fili nuk ekziston
NppHelpAbsentWarning.message: \rnuk ekziston. Ju lutem, shkarkoje nga faqja e Notepad++.

SaveCurrentModifWarning.title: Ruaj modifikimin aktual
SaveCurrentModifWarning.message: Duhet të ruani modifikimet aktuale.\rTë gjitha modifikimet e ruajtura nuk mund të ribëhen.\r\rVazhdo?

LoseUndoAbilityWarning.title: Humb paralajmërimin e aftësisë mosbëj
LoseUndoAbilityWarning.message: Duhet të ruani modifikimin aktual.\rTë gjitha modifikimet e ruajtura nuk mund të ribëhen.\r\rVazhdo?

CannotMoveDoc.title: Lëviz për tek Instanca e re Notepad++
CannotMoveDoc.message: Dokumenti është modifikuar, ruaje atë pastaj provo përsëri.

DocReloadWarning.title: Ringarko
DocReloadWarning.message: A jeni i sigurtë se doni të ringarkomi filin aktual dhe humbni ndryshimet e bëra në Notepad++?

FileLockedWarning.title: Ruajtja dështoi
FileLockedWarning.message: Ju lutem, kontrollo nëse ky fil është i hapur në ndonjë program tjetër

FileAlreadyOpenedInNpp.message: Fili është ndërkohë i hapur në Notepad++.

NbFileToOpenImportantWarning.title: Numri i fileve për t'u hapur është tepër i madh
NbFileToOpenImportantWarning.message: $INT_REPLACE$ filet janë duke u hapur.\rA jeni i sigurtë për t'i hapur ato?

SettingsOnCloudError.title: Settings on Cloud
SettingsOnCloudError.message: It seems the path of settings on cloud is set on a read only drive, or on a folder needed privilege right for writing access. Your settings on cloud will be canceled. Please reset a coherent value via Preference dialog.

FilePathNotFoundWarning.title: File Open
FilePathNotFoundWarning.message: The file you're trying to open doesn't exist.

SessionFileInvalidError.title: Could not Load Session
SessionFileInvalidError.message: Session file is either corrupted or not valid.

DroppingFolderAsProjectModeWarning.title: Invalid action
DroppingFolderAsProjectModeWarning.message: You can only drop files or folders but not both, because you're in dropping Folder as Project mode. you have to enable "Open all files of folder instead of launching Folder as Workspace on folder dropping" in "Default Directory" section of Preferences dialog to make this operation work.

SortingError.title: Sorting Error
SortingError.message: Unable to perform numeric sorting due to line $INT_REPLACE$.

ColumnModeTip.title: Column Mode Tip
ColumnModeTip.message: Please use "ALT+Mouse Selection" or "Alt+Shift+Arrow key" to switch to column mode.

DoCloseOrNot.title: Keep non existing file
DoCloseOrNot.message: The file "$STR_REPLACE$" doesn't exist anymore. Keep this file in editor?

DoDeleteOrNot.title: Delete file
DoDeleteOrNot.message: The file "$STR_REPLACE$" will be moved to your Recycle Bin and this document will be closed. Continue?

NoBackupDoSaveFile.title: Save
NoBackupDoSaveFile.message: Your backup file cannot be found (deleted from outside). Save it otherwise your data will be lost Do you want to save file "$STR_REPLACE$" ?

DoReloadOrNot.title: Reload
DoReloadOrNot.message: "$STR_REPLACE$" This file has been modified by another program. Do you want to reload it?

DoReloadOrNotAndLooseChange.title: Reload
DoReloadOrNotAndLooseChange.message: "$STR_REPLACE$" This file has been modified by another program. Do you want to reload it and lose the changes made in Notepad++?

PrehistoricSystemDetected.title: Prehistoric system detected
PrehistoricSystemDetected.message: It seems you still use a prehistoric system. This feature works only on a modern system, sorry.

XpUpdaterProblem.title: Notepad++ Updater
XpUpdaterProblem.message: Notepad++ updater is not compatible with XP due to the obsolete security layer under XP. Do you want to go to Notepad++ page to download the latest version?

DocTooDirtyToMonitor.title: Monitoring problem
DocTooDirtyToMonitor.message: The document is dirty. Please save the modification before monitoring it.

DocNoExistToMonitor.title: Monitoring problem
DocNoExistToMonitor.message: The file should exist to be monitored.

FileTooBigToOpen.title: File size problem
FileTooBigToOpen.message: File is too big to be opened by Notepad++

FileBackupFailed.title: File Backup Failed
FileBackupFailed.message: The previous version of the file could not be saved into the backup directory at "$STR_REPLACE$". Do you want to save the current file anyways?

LoadLangsFailed.title: Configurator
LoadLangsFailed.message: Load langs.xml failed! Do you want to recover your langs.xml?

FolderAsWorspaceSubfolderExists.title: Folder as Workspace adding folder problem
FolderAsWorspaceSubfolderExists.message: A sub-folder of the folder you want to add exists. Please remove its root from the panel before you add folder "$STR_REPLACE$".

ProjectPanelChanged.title: $STR_REPLACE$
ProjectPanelChanged.message: The workspace was modified. Do you want to save it?

ProjectPanelChangedSaveError.title: $STR_REPLACE$
ProjectPanelChangedSaveError.message: Your workspace has not been saved.

ProjectPanelOpenDoSaveDirtyWsOrNot.title: Open Workspace
ProjectPanelOpenDoSaveDirtyWsOrNot.message: The current workspace was modified. Do you want to save the current project?

ProjectPanelNewDoSaveDirtyWsOrNot.title: New Workspace
ProjectPanelNewDoSaveDirtyWsOrNot.message: The current workspace was modified. Do you want to save the current project?

ProjectPanelOpenFailed.title: Open Workspace
ProjectPanelOpenFailed.message: The workspace could not be opened. It seems the file to open is not a valid project file.

ProjectPanelRemoveFolderFromProject.title: Remove folder from project
ProjectPanelRemoveFolderFromProject.message: All the sub-items will be removed. Are you sure you want to remove this folder from the project?

ProjectPanelRemoveFileFromProject.title: Remove file from project
ProjectPanelRemoveFileFromProject.message: Are you sure you want to remove this file from the project?

ProjectPanelReloadError.title: Reload Workspace
ProjectPanelReloadError.message: Cannot find the file to reload.

ProjectPanelReloadDirty.title: Reload Workspace
ProjectPanelReloadDirty.message: The current workspace was modified. Reloading will discard all modifications. Do you want to continue?

UDLNewNameError.title: UDL Error
UDLNewNameError.message: This name is used by another language, please give another one.

SCMapperDoDeleteOrNot.title: Are you sure?
SCMapperDoDeleteOrNot.message: Are you sure you want to delete this shortcut?

OpenInAdminMode.title: Save failed
OpenInAdminMode.message: The file cannot be saved and it may be protected. Do you want to launch Notepad++ in Administrator mode?

OpenInAdminModeWithoutCloseCurrent.title: Save failed
OpenInAdminModeWithoutCloseCurrent.message: The file cannot be saved and it may be protected. Do you want to launch Notepad++ in Administrator mode?

OpenInAdminModeFailed.title: Open in Administrator mode failed
OpenInAdminModeFailed.message: Notepad++ cannot be opened in Administrator mode.

SelectFolderFromBrowserString.name: Select a folder to add in Folder as Workspace panel

word-chars-list-tip.value: This allows you to include additional character into current word characters while double clicking for selection or searching with "Match whole word only" option checked.

cloud-restart-warning.value: Please restart Notepad++ to take effect.

cloud-select-folder.value: Select a folder from/to where Notepad++ reads/writes its settings

shift-change-direction-tip.value: Use Shift+Enter to search in the opposite direction

find-status-top-reached.value: Find: Found the 1st occurrence from the bottom. The beginning of the document has been reached.

find-status-end-reached.value: Find: Found the 1st occurrence from the top. The end of the document has been reached.

find-status-replaceinfiles-1-replaced.value: Replace in Files: 1 occurrence was replaced

find-status-replaceinfiles-nb-replaced.value: Replace in Files: $INT_REPLACE$ occurrences were replaced

find-status-replaceinfiles-re-malformed.value: Replace in Opened Files: The regular expression is malformed

find-status-replaceinopenedfiles-1-repla.value: Replace in Opened Files: 1 occurrence was replaced

find-status-replaceinopenedfiles-nb-repl.value: Replace in Opened Files: $INT_REPLACE$ occurrences were replaced

find-status-mark-re-malformed.value: Mark: The regular expression to search is malformed

find-status-count-re-malformed.value: Count: The regular expression to search is malformed

find-status-replaceall-re-malformed.value: Replace All: The regular expression is malformed

find-status-replaceall-readonly.value: Replace All: Cannot replace text. The current document is read only

find-status-replace-end-reached.value: Replace: Replaced the 1st occurrence from the top. The end of document has been reached

find-status-replace-top-reached.value: Replace: Replaced the 1st occurrence from the bottom. The begin of document has been reached

find-status-replaced-next-found.value: Replace: 1 occurrence was replaced. The next occurrence found

find-status-replaced-next-not-found.value: Replace: 1 occurrence was replaced. The next occurrence not found

find-status-replace-readonly.value: Replace: Cannot replace text. The current document is read only
